comments.comments_text: GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot by Romelu Lukaku (Inter) low into the left of the net, giving goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny no chance!

comments.comments_text: The corner kick from Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) is headed out of the penalty area by one of the defenders.

comments.comments_text: Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) gets to the ball on the edge of the box and fires in a first-time shot without any hesitation. The strike is excellent and goes straight under the crossbar. He couldn't have done it any better. 2:1.

comments.comments_text: Antonio Conte makes a half-time substitution. Ivan Perisic comes on in place of Matteo Darmian (Inter).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] makes a half-time substitution. [PLAYER] comes on in place of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Rodrigo Bentancur (Juventus) must have known he would be sent off for this foul, but he had to stop the opponent at all costs. Gianpaolo Calvarese shows him a second yellow card and the game has ended for him.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) must have known he would be sent off for this foul, but he had to stop the opponent at all costs. [REFEREE] shows him a second yellow card and the game has ended for him.

comments.comments_text: Lautaro Martinez (Inter) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Alessandro Bastoni (Inter) was quite harsh and Gianpaolo Calvarese didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: It's an own goal! A pitiful moment for Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus), who tries to clear a cross into the six-yard box but instead sends the ball behind his own keeper. The score is 3:2.

comments.comments_text: Here comes the VAR decision from the ref - no infringement, the goal is given!

comments.comments_text: Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus) goes into the book for bad language. His vulgar comments could have made it worse. Luckily for him, it's a yellow card.
